com.game.render.fbo

Class EscapyFBO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.game.render.fbo.EscapyFBO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalMapFBO, StandartFBO

    public abstract class EscapyFBO
extends java.lang.Object

    Superclass of Frame Buffer Object, that contains GDX FrameBuffer and some usefull methods to easy work with them.

    Author:
    HenryDCO

        public void renderFBO()

        Render data from from internal FrameBuffer

        Use FBORenderProgram, EscapyGdxCamera, and EscapyPostProcessed data (null by default)

      • getNewRenderedRegion

        @Deprecated
public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion getNewRenderedRegion(EscapyPostProcessed ePP)
        Deprecated. 

        Creates new TextureRegion from contained fbo.

        Dont use it in loop, it has trand to memory leak

      • getNewRenderedBuffer

        @Deprecated
public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer getNewRenderedBuffer(EscapyPostProcessed ePP)
        Deprecated. 

        Creates new FrameBuffer from contained other fbo.

        Dont use it in loop, it has trand to memory leak

      • renderToBuffer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer renderToBuffer(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer buffer,
                                                                    EscapyPostProcessed ePP,
                                                                    EscapyGdxCamera cam)
        Render data from contained FrameBuffer into target buffer,
        this method uses for this FBORenderProgram.
        Parameters:
        buffer - - target FrameBuffer to render for.
        ePP - - optional EscapyPostProcessed data for render.
        cam - - EscapyGdxCamera cannot be null.
        Returns:
        FrameBuffer with rendered data.

      • renderToBuffer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer renderToBuffer(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer buffer,
                                                                    EscapyPostProcessed ePP)
        Render data from contained FrameBuffer into target buffer,
        this method uses for this FBORenderProgram and default camera EscapyGdxCamera.
        Parameters:
        buffer - - target FrameBuffer to render for.
        ePP - - optional EscapyPostProcessed data for render.
        Returns:
        FrameBuffer with rendered data.

      • renderToBuffer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer renderToBuffer(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer buffer)
        Render data from contained FrameBuffer into target buffer,
        this method uses for this FBORenderProgram, default camera EscapyGdxCamera and EscapyPostProcessed data for render.
        Parameters:
        buffer - - target FrameBuffer to render for.
        Returns:
        FrameBuffer with rendered data.

      • getFrameBuffer

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.FrameBuffer getFrameBuffer()
        Method that return stored main framebuffer, sometimes need to use mergeBuffer() before.
        Returns:
        FrameBuffer - main fbo
